titles.title: Domestic Energy Production Security and Stabilization Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage domestic oil and gas production, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 5/26/1999--Introduced. Domestic Energy Production Security and Stabilization Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to set forth provisions relating to domestic oil and gas production which, among other things: (1) establish a credit for producing oil and gas from marginal wells; (2) make the depreciation adjustment inapplicable to oil and gas assets; and (3) permit a taxpayer to expense geological and geophysical expenditures and to delay rental payments in connection with oil and gas development.
